briefTitle: Influence of Body Composition on Chemotherapy Outcomes in Localized Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Influence of Body Composition, Total Body Fat and Body Mass Index on the Pharmacokinetics of Docetaxel in Localized Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Comparison of docetaxel area under courb between obese and lean patients
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Woman older than
* Early breast cancer
* CT-scan of less than 3 months, including L3 level
* Indication of docetaxel at 100 mg/m² as adjuvant CT

Exclusion Criteria:

* HER2 amplified or triple negative tumors
* Pregnant or breastfeeding women
* Patients under guardianship or curatorship
* Concomitant administration of another cytotoxic drug or targeted therapy
* Psychosocial disorder
* Administration of another cytotoxic drug or targeted therapy within 20 days prior to blood collection
